::Striker/Ramulus/Brix/Fliq/DeathScythe::

Striker jumps away from the bomb as it explodes, about to fire again on the 
attackers when he sees Rush take Shadow Wing into his mouth. He holds his 
fire, growling. Striker's jetpack raises him into the air, the Maximal 
looking at Rush. He wished Ramulus were here, the ram was much better at 
negotiation than him.

"Allright, let her go and you can go peacefully," he says to Rush and the 
others, "If you kill her, we'll be forced to attack you."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus, Brix, and Fliq stop as something flies overhead, their scanners 
picking up a non-Maximal signature. Ramulus frowns.

"Can you guys get these pods back to the Ark?" he asks Brix and Fliq, the 
other two nodding.

"Allright," Ramulus says, transforming into his beast mode, "I'll see you 
back at base."

He gallops into the fores, following the flying bot (DeathScythe). Brix and 
Fliq continue on toward the Ark.
